Ingredients: fresh uncooked sweet corn husked and cut from cob:4 1/2 cups (6 ears),diced red onion:1 cup,diced avocado:1 large avocado,lime juice:1 lime or about 3 Tablespoons,chopped fresh basil:1/4 cup,sea salt:1 teaspoon,Ground pepper: to taste,
Instructions: 1: After husking and cutting corn from the cob, pull out as many corn silks as possible. Combine all ingredients in a large bowl.;2: Serve immediately or allow it to marinate for a few hours.
